src.loader.entsoe_loader module¶

class src.loader.entsoe_loader.EntsoeLoader(tracker: src.tracker.dynamodb.DynamoDBTracker, s3_client: boto3.client)[source]¶

Bases: object

static current_date() → str[source]¶
static end_date() → pandas._libs.tslibs.timestamps.Timestamp[source]¶
fetch_from_api(endpoint: str, area: str, start: pandas._libs.tslibs.timestamps.Timestamp, end: pandas._libs.tslibs.timestamps.Timestamp) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Fetches data from the ENTSOE API and returns a pandas dataframe.

Parameters

  • endpoint – The endpoint to fetch data from.

  • area – The area to fetch data from.

  • start – The start date of the data to fetch.

  • end – The end date of the data to fetch.

Returns

A pandas dataframe with the fetched data.

run(endpoint: str, area: str, start_date: pandas._libs.tslibs.timestamps.Timestamp, partition_key: str) → bool[source]¶

Fetches data from the ENTSOE API and uploads it to S3. Data is fetched in windows defined by the WINDOW_SIZE

Parameters

  • endpoint – The endpoint to fetch data from.

  • area – The area to fetch data from.

  • start_date – The start date of the data to fetch.

  • partition_key – DynamoDB partition key.

Returns

True if the data was fetched and uploaded successfully.
